title: Combat Use of the Double-Edged Fighting Knife - Applegate
description:
Combat Use Of The Double-Edged Fighting Knife 
Colonel Rex Applegate  <a href="
http://www.amazon.com/Combat-Use-Double-Edged-Fighting-Knife/dp/0873647351" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.amazon.com/Combat-Use-Double-Edged-Fighting-Knife/dp/0873647351</a>
 <a href="
http://www.amazon.com/gp/reader/0873647351/ref=sib_dp_pt#reader-link" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.amazon.com/gp/reader/0873647351/ref=sib_dp_pt#reader-link</a>

Paperback: 48 pages
Publisher: Paladin Press (July 1993)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0873647351
ISBN-13: 978-0873647359
Product Dimensions: 8.4 x 5.4 x 0.1 inches 

In general this book is a very poor value.
Many pages are blank. 
The text is primarily history designed to bolster Applegate's reputation as an expert to increase knife sales.
The small amount of useful text, charts and diagrams already appear in Fairbairn's "Get Tough"

The only redeeming quality for me is the dimensioned drawing of the Applegate knife on page 35.
However even that is flawed as the drawing is not correctly scaled when comparing relative sizes of the blade vs. grip.
